name: Bibi Blocksberg: Das große Hexenbesen-Rennen
overview: For the 30th anniversary of Bibi Blocksberg, KIDDINX released Das große Hexenbesen-Rennen, a flying broom racing game geared towards the entire family. The player can choose between six broomsticks, each with its own particular flight mechanics, and six different characters, including Bibi herself. Extra witch potions can be used to create an advantage over the other players or escape a tight situation, such as a magical fog blocking the view. A number of golden brooms are hidden in every world. Finding them will unlock new race tracks. The game contains twelve courses scattered over three "worlds": Neustadt, Schloss Klunkerburg and Blocksberg. There are three modes (Quick Race, Trophy Race and Time Trial) and the game has a multiplayer component as well.
